quote: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success. – Alexander Graham Bell
fact: The word "Checkmate" in chess comes from the Persian phrase "Shah Mat," which means "the king is dead."
joke: What did the father tomato say to the baby tomato whilst on a family walk? Ketchup.
